EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_NYC_Q119.GP Summit - 1/15/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Greenplum Summit Agenda Announced + Early Bird Savings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-2&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-summit-2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, I hope you're as excited as I am - Greenplum Summit <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-2&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-summit-2019]]> at PostgresConf 2019 <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019]]> is coming up on March 19 in New York City! This is where decision makers, data scientists, analysts, DBAs, and developers will meet to discuss, share, and shape the future of advanced data technologies. I’m writing to share the conference agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit#agenda]]> with you. It’s packed with great sessions from Greenplum users and experts, including advanced customer case studies, in-depth Greenplum tutorials, and emerging best practices in Postgres-based data analytics. We will also be showcasing an impressive array of industry-changing product announcements that you won’t want to miss! Check out the complete Greenplum Summit agenda now. <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit#agenda]]> Save 25% off your conference pass
A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Get a 25% discount on PostgresConf registration <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/buytickets]]> with promo code “2019_GREENPLUM”. For the biggest savings, register by January 18 to take advantage of early bird pricing! Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter! Follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> and @Greenplum <[[https://twitter.com/Greenplum]]> and #ScaleMatters <[[https://twitter.com/search?src=typd&q=%23ScaleMatters]]> for all the news and updates.
I hope to see you there, Jacque
